description:
Performance for hikes, and style for the situations before and after. The gusseted crotch lets you get into all sorts of positions without feeling restricted.

  • Made of 65% polyester and 35% cotton canvas
  • Gusseted crotch provides unrestricted movement
  • Adjustable waistband offers a customized fit
  • 6 pockets for all your trail essentials
  • Oeko-Tex® standard 100 certified fabric adds confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
name: Hooke Offroad Shorts - Women's
